alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 06 at 9:36PM AKST until January 07 at 10:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of dense fog has developed along the western Kenai Peninsula from Nikiski to Kenai and north of Soldotna. This area of dense fog is expected to move south along the western Kenai Peninsula coast through early Saturday morning. Expect reduced visibility to one quarter mile or less at times, especially from Nikiski to Soldotna and along the Sterling Highway to Anchor Point.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
